name: Wait on All Threads
description:
Create a method called `wait_on_threads` that accepts an array of [threads](http://www.ruby-doc.org/core-2.1.3/Thread.html) (can be empty) and waits until **all** of them finish. For example:

```ruby
thread1 = Thread.new do
  # do somethng
end
thread2 = Thread.new do
  # do somethng else
end

wait_on_threads( [thread1,thread2] )
# Should wait inside the method until both thread1 and thread2 
# finish whatever they were doing and exit. 
```

You can read more about threads in wikipedia: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Thread_(computing)
